name: Candy Cane White Chocolate Candy Cups
description: Simple instructions and recipe for how to make white chocolate and gumdrop candy cups. Made with Dots candy and white chocolate candy melts.
instructions: Put the white chocolate candy melts in a glass bowl. Rest the bowl on top of a pot half filled with water. The glass bowl must be large enough that it rests on top of the pot and is not touching the water at all. Bring the water to a low boil. Stir the candy melts until melted and smooth. Stir in the gumdrop candies, and spoon into the candy cup liners so that they are about 3/4 filled. They will harden as they cool.
